titleStmt.title: John Rogers to Thomas E. Bramlette
CWG2124

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Thomas E. Bramlette: Appointments by the Governor, Civil Appointments, 1863-1867

body.p:
Springfield Ky
June 12th 1865
His Excellency
Thos E Bramlett
Gov of Ky
I here by Respectfully tender my Resignation as a Justice of the ^peace^ in dist No 6 Washington County ^Ky^ as i am removing from the State
we Resignation Recommend Isaiah Prather as a mutual person to fill the vacancy

Allen Huse
Whos Sebtt
H A Prather
Jas Harden
John Ch Han
J T Reddicks
Thos Maryse
John Rogers
E W Ruby
Darrell McAvoy
Wm Edwards
turner Colvin
Spence Cotter
John your
John Southeland
Wm Hycksa
for value
please send on a commission at an Early day as possible

To Isaiah Prather
Willis Burge Washington
Co
Ky
